common.something_went_wrong: Kwenzeka okuthile ekungathandeki. Sicela uzame kwakhona.

home.title: Irejistra Yesizwe Yezithintelo
home.subtitle: Ukunaka abadlali kule Afrika
home.description: I-NSER yirejistra yezithintelo eziqhubeka ngentembeko kwanengcebane zemikhakha eninzi, esivumela abantu ukuba baqala ingxaki yabo yokufikelela kwiinkonzo zokudlala.

about.title: Ngotutela kwe-NSER
about.description: Irejistra Yesizwe Yezithintelo (NSER) yumkhatho ozinikelele ekuncediseni abantu ukulawula iziphiwo zabo zokudlala.
about.mission_text: Ukunika inqaba ekhuselekileyo, etitshiswe futhi ilula abantu ukuba bazisulele ngokuzithandela kwiinkonzo zokudlala zebasebenzi abazibophezela.
about.vision_text: Ikhonthinente apho umncumbane wokudlala ungawethulwa ngokwapambili kwaye ngentshisekelo yokudlala kwesizathu.
about.how_it_works_text: Fundisa ithintelo lakho kwe-NSER, futhi sizatshela babasebenzi bonke abazibophezela. Ithintelo lakho linebophezela komthetho.

self_exclude.title: Fundisa Ithintelo
self_exclude.subtitle: Zilawule ukudlala kwakho
self_exclude.description: Ithintelo yindlela enzululwazi yokunceda abantu ukuziphakelela ekudlaleni. Xa ufundisa kwe-NSER, abasebenzi abazibophezela banele ukuzikela ngokufikelela.
self_exclude.privacy_agree: Ndiyaqonda ukuba iinkcazelo zam ziya kusetyenziswa ukuyenza le nthintelo isebenze
self_exclude.confirmation_text: Uyakuqalisa ukufundisa ithintelo lakho. Le ngxaki ibenebophezela komthetho.

questions.question: Kutheni i-NSER?
questions.answer: I-NSER yirejistra yezithintelo eziqhubeka ngentembeko kwanengcebane zemikhakha eninzi, enceda abantu ukuba bazisulele kwiinkonzo zokudlala zebasebenzi abazibophezela.

questions.question: Uthini ithintelo elimisela?
questions.answer: Xa ufundisa kwe-NSER, sizatshela abasebenzi abazibophezela abacacajwa ukuzikela ekufikeni kwiinkonzo zabo ixesha lethintelo.

questions.question: Ithini ithintelo enebophezela komthetho?
questions.answer: Ewe, ithintelo elifundisiwe kwe-NSER linebophezela komthetho. Abasebenzi kufanele bakuthatele ithintelo.

questions.question: Ingaba ndinokusithi ndithathe ithintelo lam ngaphambi kwexesha?
questions.answer: Ukuthatha kwi ithintelo ngaphambi kwexesha kuxhomekeke kummiselwano oyivumeleyo. Xhumana namkameli we-NSER uxelele isikhokela.

questions.question: Ingaba iinkcazelo zam zimfihlele?
questions.answer: Ewe, iinkcazelo zakho eziyimfihlo zigotywa futhi ziphiwo nje abasebenzi abazibophezela abayidinga ukuqhubekeza ithintelo lakho.

questions.question: Kutheni i-NSER?
questions.answer: I-NSER iyomuntu lomntu oziva ukuba kufanele azilawule inzo zokudlala yakhe futhi ayifuna azithintele kwiikonzo zokudlala.

questions.question: Abasebenzi bani abazibophezela e-NSER?
questions.answer: Abasebenzi abaliqela amakulu kule Afrika basebenzela e-NSER. Jwayeleza uhlu lwethu lwabengxebi ukuze uthi inkcazelo.

questions.question: Ithintelo linemaxa eninzi?
questions.answer: Unokukhetha izixesha zethintelo ezisukela kwiinyanga ezintandathu ukuya ethintelo lonke ubomi.

contact.title: Xhumana Nathi
contact.subtitle: Nandikho ukukuncedisa
contact.description: Imibuzo ngotutela kwe-NSER? Xhumana nomsizakusebenza wethu.
contact.name: Igama Eliphelele
